brand_identity.name: Verdant
brand_identity.description: A home gardening app that blends scientific precision with the therapeutic art of growing. Designed for urban dwellers and beginners who want to reconnect with nature.
brand_identity.voice: Encouraging, knowledgeable, calm, and grounded. Avoids tech-heavy jargon; speaks in 'growth' metaphors.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic 'SaaS Blue' or 'Bootstrap' layouts.
Use 2-3x more padding than usual to create a sense of luxury and calm.
Ensure all text meets APCA contrast standards, especially on the primary green background.
Avoid pure black (#000000); use dark green or charcoal for text.
Images must be high-quality and organic, avoiding 'stock photo' looks where possible.
Implement 'glassmorphism' with 'backdrop-blur-xl' for overlays to maintain context.
Use 'Playfair Display' for all headings to establish the brand voice.
instructions_to_main_agent: Follow the 'Verdant' design system strictly. Prioritize the 'Organic & Earthy' archetype. Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections. When building the dashboard, use the 'Bento' grid layout. For the landing page, use the 'Tetris' grid. Ensure the 'Plant ID' feature feels magical with smooth transitions and clear feedback.
